article.headline: Coastal Carolina 60, Presbyterian 53
article.story: CLINTON, S.C. -- Warren Gillis scored 14 points and Anthony Raffa had 13 to lead Coastal Carolina to a 60-53 victory over Presbyterian in Big South Conference play Wednesday. Kierre Greenwood had 10 points, and Badou Diagne pulled down 10 rebounds for the Chanticleers (12-11, 7-5). Greenwood's two assists moved him past Dwight Lighty into second place on the career list with 461. Khalid Mutakabbir had 16 points and 10 rebounds, and Ryan McTavish scored 12 for the Blue Hose (6-20, 3-9), who have lost four if their past five. Coastal outrebounded Presbyterian 45-27, and the Chanticleers' 22 offensive rebounds gave them a 19-4 advantage on second-chance points. The Chanticleers led 48-40 on Raffa's 3-pointer and El Hadji Ndieguene's free throw with 8:15 remaining. McTavish hit two foul shots to close to 52-48 at 2:31, and Mutakabbir's 3-pointer got them to 57-53 at 0:44, but Raffa's two free throws sealed it.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
